name: Niplheim's Hunter - Branded Azel - Mature Content
detailed_description:
WARNING!
Save data from the base game is not compatible with the DLC.
Some events will not trigger and there might be errors or crashes,
make sure you don't load incompatible saves.

About Censors/mosaics:
All scenes are uncensored with no mosaics, except for the
cross section / X-ray animation during battles where you can see the
monster's genitals inside Azel. The animation will be uncensored
and added in later for free, I apologize about the inconvenience.
You can read the details in the community hub.

Average time to 100% clear the game
5-7 hours.If you skip scenes and
don't read any text then2-4 hoursor so.

DLC Features:

Lust Brand & EP System
Azel can utilize the magic of the Lust Brand
on her abdomen and use special skills.
Using skills raises your EP and when it hits 100,
the Lust Brand goes wild and Azel goes in heat.
Monsters affected by the Lust Brand will
fuck Azel in a variety of scenes.

EP resets after in-battle scenes and you can
also reset it by doing events during the night.

H-Stats
Lust Brand counts and records Azel's orgasms,
sensitivities and the amount of semen she has milked
and if you meet the requirements,
you can learn helpful passive skills.

You can also view these stats in a H-Stats menu.

Variety of H-Scenes
In addition to the intense ADV style scenes,
there are also battle fuck scenes and you can enjoy
watching the heroine get fucked endlessly with a
hands-free system (the sex ends when you press a button).

All scenes are voiced and you can turn them on/off as you please.

Fetishes & Sexual Acts
The game contains fetishes and sexual acts like:

ahegao, anal sex, bondage, creampies, deepthroating & fellatio, gangbangs, huge tits,
huge cocks, humiliation, masturbation, multiple/endless orgasms, nipple teasing,
non-consensual sex(male on female and female on male), prostitution, sex toys,
sex while drugged (male only drugged and and both male & female drugged),
sex with monsters, sexual massages, sexual milking/lactation, sexy outfits & dress up,
spanking, tentacle sex, titjobs and voyeurism (female peeping at male & female having sex).

All sexual acts happen to females unless otherwise stated.

*Note: You play as a female character and all scenes are from her perspective,
except for a few scenes which are from Azel's male companion's perspective.

Controls
The game can only be played with a keyboard or a controller.
Mouse is not supported.
[Z] = Accept, Hold for Fast Battles
[X] = Cancel, Menu
[Ctrl] = Skip Text
[Shift] = Auto Text Mode, [X] to stop
[Q]= Hide Dialog
[W] = Text Log

H-Scene Info
Base CGs: 34 (~600 images in total)
H-Scenes: +30
Battle Fucks: 15 (H-Scenes are counted separately, so +45 scenes in total)
Scene Gallery: You can view every scene you have unlocked in the gallery.

Note
The game was created by Black Train in collaboration with Sugar Star.
The game is made in Wolf RPG Editor.

All characters are over the age of 18.

short_description: A horny girl fights demon beasts with equipment made of their corpses while searching for the Black Demon Beast that branded her. Hunt monsters during the day and cocks during the night!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP/2000
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP/2000
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
